markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supreme Spellstrike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2884) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 49 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

</column>

---

You've made it almost effortless to combine spells and attacks. You're permanently [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32). You can use your extra action only to Strike or to recharge Spellstrike.
name: Supreme Spellstrike
